title: Engagement Retention and Performance Improvement Strategies in Online Language Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and fundamental job-related knowledge
context.additional_context: Learners are working professionals (administrative/managerial) balancing work and study, with performance measured through project-based assessments in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners can interact with peer learners and instructors at least twice a week through online community activities.
Learners can achieve a completion rate of 80% or higher by establishing and executing self-directed learning plans upon course completion.
Learners can acquire and evaluate communication skills applicable to real-world job situations through language project implementation.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
